item.title: I-15 South - Exit 57
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 57 - UT-130/South Main. This is the south end of the Cedar City business loop.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 59
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 59 - UT-56/200 North. I-15 continues south to Las Vegas (Nevada).

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 62
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 62 - BL-15/UT-130/To UT-14 East/North Main. This is the north end of the Cedar City business loop.

item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 62 - BL-15/UT-130/To UT-14 East/North Main. This is the north end of the Cedar City business loop.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 75
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 75 - UT-143/Parowan

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 78
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 78 - BL-15/UT-274/To UT-143/Parowan. This is the northern end of the Parowan business loop.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 78
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 78 - BL-15/UT-274/To UT-143/Parowan.

item.title: I-15 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-15 south. Distance to Parowan and Cedar City. This is the older type of distance marker with horizontal lines between each destination.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 95
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 95 - UT-20/To US-89/Panguitch/Kanab. UT-20 is a short highway that connects I-15 with US-89.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 100
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 100 - Fremont Wash

item.title: UT-56 West at UT-18 South
item.description: UT-56 west at UT-18 south in Beryl Junction.

item.title: UT-56 West Approaching UT-18
item.description: UT-56 West approaching UT-18 south to Enterprise and St. George. Continue west on UT-56 for Modena.

item.title: UT-56 West - Beryl Junction
item.description: Entering Beryl Junction on UT-56 west.

item.title: UT-56 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-56 west. Distance to Newcastle, Beryl Junction, and Enterprise.

item.title: I-15 North Exit 59 Offramp at UT-56
item.description: I-15 North Exit 59 offramp at UT-56 in Cedar City.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 59
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 59 - UT-56/200 North. I-15 continues north towards Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 59
item.description: I-15 North approaching Exit 59 - UT-56/200 North.

item.title: Cross Hollow Road at I-15 South
item.description: Cross Hollow Road at I-15 South to Salt Lake City. Continue straight for I-15 north to St. George and Las Vegas.

item.title: BL-15/UT-130 South at Cross Hollow Road
item.description: BL-15/UT-130 South at Cross Hollow Road. Continue straight for I-15 south on ramp. Turn right on Cross Hollow Road for I-15 north on ramp.

item.title: End UT-14 West at BL-15/UT-130
item.description: End UT-14 West at BL-15/UT-130 in Cedar City.

item.title: End UT-148 South at UT-14
item.description: End UT-148 south at UT-14. Turn right on UT-14 for Cedar City and I-15. Turn left on UT-14 for US-89. UT-14 is part of the Markagunt High Plateau Scenic Byway.

item.title: UT-143 West at UT-148
item.description: UT-143 west at UT-148. Turn right to continue west on UT-143 (Utah’s Patchwork Parkway National Scenic Byway). Turn left for UT-148 (Cedar Breaks Scenic Byway).

item.title: UT-143 West at UT-148
item.description: UT-143 west at UT-148. Use UT-148 south to Cedar City. Continue west on UT-143 (right turn) for Brian Head and Parowan. The Utah DOT changed direction on UT-143 between Panguitch Lake and UT-148 junction. At Panguitch UT-143 is a north/south highway. At this junction it is an east/west highway.

item.title: UT-20 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-20 east. Distance to US-89, Panguitch, Circleville, and Kanab.

item.title: UT-20 East in Iron County
item.description: UT-20 East in Iron County. This is the first reassurance marker on UT-20 east after I-15.

item.title: I-15 South at UT-20 Junction
item.description: I-15 south offramp at UT-20. Turn left for US-89, Panguitch, and Kanab.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 95
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 95 - UT-20/To US-89/Panguitch/Kanab. UT-20 is a short highway that connects I-15 with US-89.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 100
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 100 - Ranch Exit.

item.title: I-15 South - Iron County
item.description: Iron County on I-15 south.

item.description: UT-56 West leaving Modena.

item.description: End UT-18 North at UT-56 in Beryl Junction.

item.description: UT-18 North Approaching UT-56 junction.

item.title: UT-18 North - Beryl Junction
item.description: Entering Beryl Junction on UT-18 north.

item.title: UT-14 East at UT-148
item.description: UT-14 east approaching UT-148 north to Cedar Breaks, Panguitch Lake, and Brian Head.

item.title: UT-14 East - Cedar Breaks Road Status
item.description: UT-14 east above Cedar City. Road closure information for UT-148/Cedar Breaks Road.

item.title: UT-130 North at UT-14
item.description: UT-130 north at UT-14 east.

item.title: UT-130 North Approaching UT-14
item.description: UT-130 north approaching UT-14. Use UT-14 east for Cedar Breaks and Bryce Canyon. Turn left for Southern Utah University.

item.title: UT-130 North Approaching UT-14
item.description: UT-130 north approaching UT-14. UT-14 is marked as a Utah scenic byway.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 59
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 59 - UT-56/Cedar City. I-15 continues south to St. George.
